roleset.name: to make poor, deplete
roleset.note: IMPOVERISH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'impoverish' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from impoverish.01-v predicate notes)
IMPOVERISHED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from impoverished.01-j)

example.name: passive
example.text: `` [My husband]-2 was instantly impoverished [*-2]by the very act of [*] marrying me , '' she says [*T*-1] .
example.arg: by the very act of [*] marrying me
